state_description: This screen is part of the CleanMyMac X application, displaying the Smart Scan feature in progress. It shows the optimization process, including cleaning system junk, emptying trash bins, flushing DNS cache, and freeing up RAM.

enables.name: Stop Scan
enables.description: Stops the ongoing Smart Scan process.

enables.name: View Details
enables.description: Allows the user to view detailed results of the scan for each category.
